metadata.title: CVE-2024-50244 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Additional check in ni_clear()Checking of NTFS_FLAGS_LOG_REPLAYING added to prevent access touninitialized bitmap during replay process.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
